detaileddescription.para: Sets the options for the specific model. The model has to call this method once the ModelOptions object has been passed to the model's init(Modeloptions) method. This is done automatically within the init(Modeloptions) method.

parameterdescription.para: Model : The specific model for this options setting

detaileddescription.para: Defines an interface to design the individual model options. This interface does not define any special methods. It is used to clarify the API by publishing a name for this type of objects.
